cards.name: Mountain Ring
text: Prevent all damage done to Benched Pokémon by attacks (both yours and your opponent's).

cards.name: Sail Fossil
text: Look at the bottom 7 cards of your deck. You may reveal an Amaura you find there and put it onto your Bench. Shuffle the other cards back into your deck.

cards.name: Sparkling Robe
text: The Pokémon this card is attached to can't be affected by any Special Conditions. (Remove any Special Conditions affecting that Pokémon.)

cards.name: Super Scoop Up
text: Flip a coin. If heads, put 1 of your Pokémon and all cards attached to it into your hand.

cards.name: Tool Retriever
text: Choose up to 2 Pokémon Tool cards attached to your Pokémon and put them into your hand.

cards.name: Training Center
text: Each Stage 1 and Stage 2 Pokémon in play (both yours and your opponent's) gets +30 HP.

attacks.name: Jump On
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 more damage.

cards.name: Maintenance
text: Shuffle 2 cards from your hand into your deck. (If you can't shuffle 2 cards into your deck, you can't play this card.) Then, draw a card.

cards.name: M Heracross-EX
text: When a Pokémon-EX has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.
When 1 of your Pokémon becomes a Mega Evolution Pokémon, your turn ends.

attacks.name: Big Bang Horn
attacks.text: This attack does 180 damage minus 10 damage for each damage counter on this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Quick Attack
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 more damage.

attacks.name: Spiral Current
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Confused. That Pokémon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.

attacks.name: Finishing Blow
attacks.text: If your opponent's Active Pokémon already has any damage counters on it, this attack does 50 more damage.

attacks.name: Igloo Hold
attacks.text: This attack does 20 more damage for each Colorless in your opponent's Active Pokémon's Retreat Cost.

attacks.name: Mountain Drop
attacks.text: If there is any Stadium card in play, this attack does 40 more damage.

attacks.name: Bubble
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Reverse Thrust
attacks.text: Switch this Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Splash Cannon
attacks.text: This attack does 20 more damage for each Water Energy attached to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Tag Team Spark
attacks.text: This attack does 20 more damage for each Energy attached to your Magmortar.

attacks.name: Gigavolt
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 more damage. If tails, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Positive Hand
attacks.text: Discard a basic Energy card from your hand. If you do, draw 2 cards.

attacks.name: Electric Tail
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Poison Sting
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Poisoned.

attacks.name: Fortunate Eye
attacks.text: Look at the top 5 cards of your opponent's deck and put them back on top of his or her deck in any order.

attacks.name: Stretch Kick
attacks.text: This attack does 30 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Quick Draw
attacks.text: Draw a card.

attacks.name: Helicoptero
attacks.text: Switch this Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

cards.name: M Lucario-EX
text: When a Pokémon-EX has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Rising Fist
attacks.text: Discard an Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Lunge
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

cards.name: Korrina
text: Search your deck for a Fighting Pokémon and an Item card, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

ability.name: Shining Spirit
ability.text: Damage from this Pokémon's attacks isn't affected by Weakness or Resistance.

attacks.name: Flying Press
attacks.text: If your opponent's Active Pokémon isn't a Pokémon-EX, this attack does nothing.

attacks.name: Follow Me
attacks.text: Switch 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon with your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Moonblast
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done by attacks from the Defending Pokémon is reduced by 30 (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

ability.name: Secret Key
ability.text: Each of your Fairy Pokémon's Resistance is now -40.

attacks.name: Fairy Lock
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.

ability.name: Energy Evolution
ability.text: When you attach a basic Energy card from your hand to this Pokémon, you may search your deck for a card that evolves from this Pokémon that is the same type as that Energy card and put it onto this Pokémon. (This counts as evolving this Pokémon.) Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Big Yawn
attacks.text: Both Active Pokémon are now Asleep.

attacks.name: Reckless Charge
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, this Pokémon does 20 damage to itself.

cards.name: Battle Reporter
text: Draw cards until you have the same number of cards in your hand as your opponent.

cards.name: Energy Switch
text: Move a basic Energy from 1 of your Pokémon to another of your Pokémon.

cards.name: Fighting Stadium
text: The attacks of each Fighting Pokémon in play (both yours and your opponent's) do 20 more damage to the Defending Pokémon-EX (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

cards.name: Fossil Researcher
text: Search your deck for up to 2 in any combination of Amaura or Tyrunt and put them onto your Bench. Shuffle your deck afterward.

cards.name: Full Heal
text: Remove all Special Conditions from your Active Pokémon.

cards.name: Jaw Fossil
text: Look at the bottom 7 cards of your deck. You may reveal a Tyrunt you find there and put it onto your Bench. Shuffle the other cards back into your deck.

cards.name: Herbal Energy
text: This card can only be attached to Grass Pokémon. This card provides Grass Energy only while this card is attached to a Grass Pokémon. When you attach this card from your hand to 1 of your Grass Pokémon, heal 30 damage from that Pokémon. (If this card is attached to anything other than a Grass Pokémon, discard this card.)

cards.name: Strong Energy
text: This card can only be attached to Fighting Pokémon. This card provides Fighting Energy only while this card is attached to a Fighting Pokémon. The attacks of the Fighting Pokémon this card is attached to do 20 more damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance). (If this card is attached to anything other than a Fighting Pokémon, discard this card.)
